title: State's right unaffected by expiration of time for proceeding
context: [ยง523A-57] State&rsquo;s right unaffected by expiration of time for proceeding. The expiration of any period of time specified by statute or court order, during which an action or proceeding may be commenced or enforced to obtain payment of a claim for funds or delivery of property shall not affect the right of this State to acquire possession of unclaimed property in accordance with the provisions of this part. [L 1988, c 93, pt of ยง2]
